Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

gpgr 1.2.0 (2021-02-07)

  • ‚≠ê Support for DVC (pr43, issue41).
  • üîß Fixes for LINX tables (pr40)
  • üîß Bug fix for LINX CLI (8e89ac6

gpgr 1.1.0 (2021-01-12)

  • ‚≠ê Add LINX RMarkdown report.
  • ‚≠ê Added script for tidying umccrised MultiQC JSON output (pr38).
  • ‚≠ê Add CLI for LINX reporter (pr39).
  • üîß Add LINX description tibble and refactor LINX code (pr36).

gpgr 1.0.0 (2021-12-22)

  • Major change: Moving signature tool wrappers (CHORD, HRDetect, and MutationalPatterns) to sigrap (https://github.com/umccr/sigrap) (pr35).
  • Support for LINX tables (pr34).

gpgr 0.2.0 (2021-11-23)

  • new release after a year in the freezer
  • ‚≠ê add CLI for CHORD, HRDetect and MutationalPatterns (pr26, pr28, issue17)
  • ‚≠ê add 6 new SBS signatures from the March 2021 COSMIC release (v3.2) (issue22, pr23)
  • ‚≠ê update to use the base pipe operator (|>) introduced in R 4.1 (pr24)
  • ‚≠ê add handy get_genome_obj function that returns a BSgenome object, provided a ‚ÄòhgXX‚Äô string (useful for MutationalPatterns & CHORD) (pr20)
  • ‚≠ê add handy pkg_exists function that checks if the specified R package exists on the local system (pr20)
  • ‚ùì add readr::local_edition(1) before readr::read_tsv due to readr using vroom under the hood (I‚Äôm not too comfortable with this, but anyway). See https://www.tidyverse.org/blog/2021/07/readr-2-0-0/#readr-2nd-edition. I think it happens because I‚Äôm using the comment parameter to read in the gzipped VCF. Oh well (pr21)
  • üîß use bumpversion for updating pkg versions (issue18, pr19)
  • üîß add pre-commit hooks and styler (issue25, pr27)

gpgr 0.1.0 (2020-11-19)

  • Handle umccrise cancer report functionality:
    • PURPLE CNVs
    • SVs (tables + BND plots)
    • AF (summary + plot)
    • HRD
    • write final tables to tsv + json
    • Support for MutationalPatterns v3.0 (https://github.com/UMCUGenetics/MutationalPatterns)
    • Support for PURPLE v2.51+

gpgr 0.0.6 (2020-10-09)

  • Initial release of gpgr. Features include:
    • Support for CHORD (https://github.com/UMCUGenetics/CHORD)
    • Support for HRDetect (https://github.com/Nik-Zainal-Group/signature.tools.lib)
    • Support for PURPLE (https://github.com/hartwigmedical/hmftools/tree/master/purple)
    • R package webpage deployed via GitHub Actions at https://umccr.github.io/gpgr/
